text: Niscaya yisakale kupharai karaiche, sihamte allahara pathara paraa manuhaka nibrtta karaibalai sihamtara dhana-sampada byaya karae, acirae'i sihamte seya byaya karaiba, tara pichata seya sihamtara manastapara karana ha’ba; iyara pichata sihamte paraabhuta ha’ba; arau yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamtaka jahannamata ekatraita karaa ha’ba
